title: In the Shadow of the Blue Rascal (1986 - France) avant-garde
description:
Ã€ l'ombre de la canaille bleue (1986 - France)     In the Shadow of the Blue Rascal

Arthouse / Crime / Drama
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0229088/


Three hundred kilos of heroin have disappeared in Necrocity - a city of terror, a city of night - where Captain Speed has a gang, and the government hides the dead.

Pierre ClÃ©menti's In the Shadow of the Blue Rascal is an experimental crime film considered to be a landmark of Parisian underground cinema. Gritty and dystopian, it is as much a crime film as a science fiction affair, one that lets its disturbing vision fill in the spaces between the twists in the plot. It's drugged out and disturbing without being too graphic, and it's completely chaotic. The film took several years to finish, with work starting in 1979 and completion in 1985.


Video: XviD, 640x480, 25.000 fps, 1695 Kbps, 01h21m01s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps

DVDRip, film print obviously not restored, French audio, optional English subtitles
